mapper.insert: insert into tbl_board(writer, password, title, content) values(#{writer},#{password},#{title},#{content})
mapper.select: select T1.* from (select * from tbl_board order by bno desc) T1 limit #{pageRequest}, #{amount}
select count(bno) from tbl_board where bno>0
select IF(password = #{password},t1.bno,0) from tbl_board t1 where bno=#{bno};
